verses.verse: Arise, <S%H6965><s%> shine; <S%H215><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thy light <S%H216><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is risen <S%H2224><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee.

For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and gross darkness <S%H6205><s%> the people: <S%H3816><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall arise <S%H2224><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and his glory <S%H3519><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee.
And the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H1980><s%> to thy light, <S%H216><s%> and kings <S%H4428><s%> to the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of thy rising. <S%H2225><s%>

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and see: <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they gather themselves together, <S%H6908><s%> they come <S%H935><s%> to thee: thy sons <S%H1121><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> from far, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be nursed <S%H539><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> thy side. <S%H6654><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> thou shalt see, <S%H7200><s%> and flow together, <S%H5102><s%> and thine heart <S%H3824><s%> shall fear, <S%H6342><s%> and be enlarged; <S%H7337><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the abundance <S%H1995><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be converted <S%H2015><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> thee, the forces <S%H2428><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto thee.

The multitude <S%H8229><s%> of camels <S%H1581><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> thee, the dromedaries <S%H1070><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> and Ephah; <S%H5891><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they from Sheba <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7614><s%> shall come: <S%H935><s%> they shall bring <S%H5375><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and incense; <S%H3828><s%> and they shall show forth <S%H1319><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall be gathered together <S%H6908><s%> unto thee, the rams <S%H352><s%> of Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> unto thee: they shall come up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> acceptance <S%H7522><s%> on mine altar, <S%H4196><s%> and I will glorify <S%H6286><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of my glory. <S%H8597><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> that fly <S%H5774><s%> as a cloud, <S%H5645><s%> and as the doves <S%H3123><s%> to <S%H413><s%> their windows? <S%H699><s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H6960><s%> for me, and the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> first, <S%H7223><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> from far, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them, unto the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and to the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath glorified <S%H6286><s%> thee.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of strangers <S%H5236><s%> shall build up <S%H1129><s%> thy walls, <S%H2346><s%> and their kings <S%H4428><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> unto thee: for <S%H3588><s%> in my wrath <S%H7110><s%> I smote <S%H5221><s%> thee, but in my favor <S%H7522><s%> have I had mercy <S%H7355><s%> on thee.

Therefore thy gates <S%H8179><s%> shall be open <S%H6605><s%> continually; <S%H8548><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be shut <S%H5462><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> nor night; <S%H3915><s%> that men may bring <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee the forces <S%H2428><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> and that their kings <S%H4428><s%> may be brought. <S%H5090><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> that <S%H834><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> thee shall perish; <S%H6><s%> yea, those nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be utterly wasted. <S%H2717><s%> <S%H2717><s%>

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, the fir tree, <S%H1265><s%> the pine tree, <S%H8410><s%> and the box <S%H8391><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> to beautify <S%H6286><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of my sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> and I will make the place <S%H4725><s%> of my feet <S%H7272><s%> glorious. <S%H3513><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of them that afflicted <S%H6031><s%> thee shall come <S%H1980><s%> bending <S%H7817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee; and all <S%H3605><s%> they that despised <S%H5006><s%> thee shall bow themselves down <S%H7812><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the soles <S%H3709><s%> of thy feet; <S%H7272><s%> and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> thee, The city <S%H5892><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> The Zion <S%H6726><s%> of the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Whereas <S%H8478><s%> thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> forsaken <S%H5800><s%> and hated, <S%H8130><s%> so that no man <S%H369><s%> went through <S%H5674><s%> thee, I will make <S%H7760><s%> thee an eternal <S%H5769><s%> excellency, <S%H1347><s%> a joy <S%H4885><s%> of many generations. <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%>

Thou shalt also suck <S%H3243><s%> the milk <S%H2461><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> and shalt suck <S%H3243><s%> the breast <S%H7699><s%> of kings: <S%H4428><s%> and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> am thy Savior <S%H3467><s%> and thy Redeemer, <S%H1350><s%> the mighty One <S%H46><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

For <S%H8478><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and for <S%H8478><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> and for <S%H8478><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> and for <S%H8478><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> iron: <S%H1270><s%> I will also make <S%H7760><s%> thy officers <S%H6486><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and thine exactors <S%H5065><s%> righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be heard <S%H8085><s%> in thy land, <S%H776><s%> wasting <S%H7701><s%> nor destruction <S%H7667><s%> within thy borders; <S%H1366><s%> but thou shalt call <S%H7121><s%> thy walls <S%H2346><s%> Salvation, <S%H3444><s%> and thy gates <S%H8179><s%> Praise. <S%H8416><s%>

The sun <S%H8121><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> thy light <S%H216><s%> by day; <S%H3119><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> for brightness <S%H5051><s%> shall the moon <S%H3394><s%> give light <S%H215><s%> unto thee: but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto thee an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and thy God <S%H430><s%> thy glory. <S%H8597><s%>

Thy sun <S%H8121><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> go down; <S%H935><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall thy moon <S%H3391><s%> withdraw itself: <S%H622><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy mourning <S%H60><s%> shall be ended. <S%H7999><s%>

Thy people <S%H5971><s%> also shall be all <S%H3605><s%> righteous: <S%H6662><s%> they shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> the branch <S%H5342><s%> of my planting, <S%H4302><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands, <S%H3027><s%> that I may be glorified. <S%H6286><s%>

A little one <S%H6996><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and a small one <S%H6810><s%> a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will hasten <S%H2363><s%> it in his time. <S%H6256><s%>
